#summary How to install MinGW

 # Download an installer executable from https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=2435&package_id=240780, for example'MinGW-5.1.4.exe' onto your desktop or somewhere easy to locate. Run it.
 # You can select a full install or deselect the g77 compiler, Ada compiler, and Java compiler.
 # Then select 'C:\MinGW' as your destination folder and click install.

MinGW intallation is finished. Now, can be started with the intallation of [Installing_MSYS_for_Windows MSYS] shell environment.
